issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
SequenceFile.createWriter no longer works on an existing file, because old version specified OVEWRITE by default and new version does not.  This breaks some HBase tests.

Tested against trunk.

Patch with test to follow.
fields.summary: SequenceFile.createWriter(...createParent...) no longer works on existing file

comments.body: +1  pending jenkins.  Good catch Greg.  Looks like this was introduced in HADOOP-6840. I confirmed this is indeed the behavior on branch-1.
Same patch, rebased on top of branch.

Integrated in Hadoop-Common-trunk-Commit #1600 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Common-trunk-Commit/1600/])
    HADOOP-7997. SequenceFile.createWriter(...createParent...) no longer works on existing file. Contributed by Gregory Chanan
